title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Collaborative Workshop on Mathematical Learning Technology Design for Higher Vocational Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain math problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy using collaborative learning techniques.
Learners can visualize math concepts using digital tools and suggest at least 3 improvements through peer evaluation.
Learners can collaborate with instructional designers to build personalized learning portfolios and incorporate feedback at least twice.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
